com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.utilities

Class SchulzeMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.utilities.SchulzeMethod

  • class SchulzeMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for combining a set of small subset rankings into a full ranking. Used with the Custom Ordinal Rank inputs (Qualitative stuff). Uses the Schulze Method
    Version:
    Author:
    Andrew Messing
